languages.text: "Предстать перед публикой в обществе {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g}? Вызывающе и интригующе. Такого поведения и ждут от Вольного Торговца — человека, обладающего немыслимыми для прочих смертных привилегиями".

traits.locale_text: "Предстатать перед публикой в обществе ксеноса? Вызывающе и интригующе. Такого поведения и ждут от Вольного Торговца — человека, обладающего немыслимыми для прочих смертных привилегиями".

languages.text: "To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."
languages.original_text: "Предстать перед публикой в обществе {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеноса{/g}? Вызывающе и интригующе. Такого поведения и ждут от Вольного Торговца — человека, обладающего немыслимыми для прочих смертных привилегиями".

traits.locale_text: "To appear before the people in the company of a xenos? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behavior that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

"To appear before the people in the company of a xenos? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behavior that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

"To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

"To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

"To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

languages.text: 「人民の前に{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の仲間を見せるというのですか？挑発的でありながら、面白い戦略です。こうした振る舞いは人民が自由開拓者に期待するもの…他の人間には思いもよらぬ特権の使い方です」
languages.original_text: "To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

traits.locale_text: 「人民の前に{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}の仲間を見せるというのですか？挑発的でありながら、面白い戦略です。こうした振る舞いは人民が自由開拓者に期待するもの…他の人間には思いもよらぬ特権の使い方です」

languages.text: “在{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}的陪伴下出席典礼？不拘一格，耐人寻味。但这完全符合常人对行商浪人的印象——没人能永远想象到行商浪人手握怎样的特权。”
languages.original_text: "To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

traits.locale_text: “在{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}的陪伴下出席典礼？不拘一格，耐人寻味。但这完全符合常人对行商浪人的印象——没人能永远想象到行商浪人手握怎样的特权。”

languages.text: «¿Aparecer ante la gente en compañía de una {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? Un gesto provocador e intrigante. Es la clase de comportamiento que la gente espera ver en un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, que posee privilegios impensables para el resto de los mortales».
languages.original_text: "To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

traits.locale_text: «¿Aparecer ante la gente en compañía de una {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? Un gesto provocador e intrigante. Es la clase de comportamiento que la gente espera ver en un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, que posee privilegios impensables para el resto de los mortales».

languages.text: « Vous voulez apparaître devant votre peuple en compagnie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ? Provocateur et intrigant à la fois. C'est exactement le genre de choses auxquelles le peuple s'attend de la part d'un libre-marchand, dont les privilèges dépassent l'entendement des simples mortels. »
languages.original_text: "To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez apparaître devant votre peuple en compagnie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} ? Provocateur et intrigant à la fois. C'est exactement le genre de choses auxquelles le peuple s'attend de la part d'un libre-marchand, dont les privilèges dépassent l'entendement des simples mortels. »

languages.text: "Ihr wollt in Begleitung einer {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} vor dem Volk erscheinen? Eine provokante und faszinierende Entscheidung. Ein derartiges Verhalten erwarten die Menschen von Freihändlern – Privilegien, die sich andere Sterbliche nicht einmal vorstellen können."
languages.original_text: "To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt in Begleitung einer {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} vor dem Volk erscheinen? Eine provokante und faszinierende Entscheidung. Ein derartiges Verhalten erwarten die Menschen von Freihändlern – Privilegien, die sich andere Sterbliche nicht einmal vorstellen können."

languages.text: "İnsanların karşısına bir {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} ile mi çıkacaksınız? Kışkırtıcı ve merak uyandırıcı bir hamle. İnsanlar da diğer ölümlüler için olanaksız olan ayrıcalıklara sahip Hür Tacir'in işte böyle davranmasını bekliyor."
languages.original_text: "To appear before the people in the company of a {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}? A provocative and intriguing move. It is this kind of behaviour that people expect to see from a Rogue Trader — the wielder of privileges unthinkable for other mortals."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanların karşısına bir {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} ile mi çıkacaksınız? Kışkırtıcı ve merak uyandırıcı bir hamle. İnsanlar da bir Hür Tacir'den, diğer ölümlülerin düşünülemez bulduğu işte böylesi ayrıcalıkların kullanıcısı olarak davranmasını bekliyor."
